attributes.action: Reinstate Russell Brand, Jonathan Ross and Lesley Douglas back to their jobs and stop the BBC pandering to mass hysteria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is absolutely ludicrous that so much media coverage has been afforded to a radio show in which only two people complained.

The papers whipped up a frenzied attach against Brand & Ross when most normal thinking people found the whole episode, at best funny and at worst, ill thought out. In any case someone else at the BBC allowed it to be aired and I for one would not be offended if they had left the messages on my answer phone.

The BBC has been weak in its stance and should have stood up to the flack. We will all be worse off in the future if this kind of censorship continuously takes place.

How many people have listened to the broadcast and found it not necessary to complain?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
